import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import Nav from "react-bootstrap/Nav"; import Navbar from "react-bootstrap/Navbar"; import NavDropdown from "react-bootstrap/NavDropdown"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; const CustomNavbar = () => { // add a new box const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); // list all my boxes const [myBox, setMyBox] = useState(false); const handleMyBoxClose = () => setMyBox(false); const handleMyBoxShow = () => setMyBox(true); // User settings const [userSettings, setUserSettings] = useState(false); const handleUserSettingsClose = () => setUserSettings(false); const handleUserSettings = () => setUserSettings(true); ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// const [createUserSettings, setCreateUserSettings] = useState(false); const handleCreateUserSettingsClose = () => setCreateUserSettings(false); const handleCreateUserSettings = () => setCreateUserSettings(true); const [input, setInput] = useState({ userName: '', userPassword:'', userLocation:'', userBoxes:'' }) function handleChange(event) { const {name, value} = event.target; setInput(prevInput => { return { ...prevInput, [name]: value } }) } // function handleClick(event) { // event.preventDefault(); // const newUser = { // userName: input.userName, // userPassword: input.userPassword, // userLocation: input.userLocation, // userBoxes: [] // } // axios.post('http://localhost:3001/createuser', newUser) // } ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// return (

); }; export default CustomNavbar;
